pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Trophic Position Models using 'stan' // Bayesian trophic position models using 'stan' by leveraging 'brms' for stable isotope data. Trophic position models are derived by using equations from Post (2002) doi:10.1890/0012-9658(2002)083[0703:USITET]2.0.CO;2, Vander Zanden and Vadeboncoeur (2002) doi:10.1890/0012-9658(2002)083[2152:FAIOBA]2.0.CO;2, and Heuvel et al. (2024) doi:10.1139/cjfas-2024-0028.
